mapper.sql: VIP_CUST_NO, VIP_NAME, ADDRESS_TXT, PROVINCE, CITY, COUNTY, MP, TEL, ZIP, ALIPAY_ACCOUNT, WEBCHAT_NO, NH_EC_ACCOUNT, JD_ACCOUNT, CERT_ID, VIP_SRC, VIP_TYPE, SUBSCRIBE_DATE, SUBSCRIBER, STATUS, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_BY_TXT, LAST_MODIFIED, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT
mapper.insert: insert into t_md_vip_cust_info (VIP_CUST_NO, VIP_NAME, ADDRESS_TXT, PROVINCE, CITY, COUNTY, MP, TEL, ZIP, ALIPAY_ACCOUNT, WEBCHAT_NO, NH_EC_ACCOUNT, JD_ACCOUNT, CERT_ID, VIP_SRC, VIP_TYPE, SUBSCRIBE_DATE, SUBSCRIBER, STATUS, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_BY_TXT, LAST_MODIFIED, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT ) values (#{vipCustNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vipName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alipayAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{webchatNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nhEcAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jdAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{certId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vipSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vipType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subscribeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{subscriber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifiedByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update t_md_vip_cust_info set VIP_NAME = #{vipName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS_TXT = #{addressTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTY = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MP = #{mp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZIP = #{zip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ALIPAY_ACCOUNT = #{alipayAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEBCHAT_NO = #{webchatNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NH_EC_ACCOUNT = #{nhEcAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JD_ACCOUNT = #{jdAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERT_ID = #{certId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIP_SRC = #{vipSrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VIP_TYPE = #{vipType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBSCRIBE_DATE = #{subscribeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, SUBSCRIBER = #{subscriber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_AT = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY_TXT = #{createByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_MODIFIED = #{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT = #{lastModifiedByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where VIP_CUST_NO = #{vipCustNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from t_md_vip_cust_info where MP like '%' #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} '%'
